content.question: If <math alttext="the cosine of, open parenthesis, 4 x minus y, close parenthesis, equals, x plus y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>y</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, then <math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="negative 1 minus the sine of, open parenthesis, 4 x minus y, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 2 plus, 4 times the sine of, open parenthesis, 4 x minus y, close parenthesis, and denominator the sine of, open parenthesis, 4 x minus y, close parenthesis, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>y</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>y</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the negative of the fraction with numerator 1, and denominator 1 plus the sine of, open parenthesis, 4 x minus y, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>y</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 1 plus, 4 times the sine of, open parenthesis, 4 x minus y, close parenthesis, and denominator negative 1 plus the sine of, open parenthesis, 4 x minus y, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>y</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>y</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator 1 plus, 4 times the sine of, open parenthesis, 4 x minus y, close parenthesis, and denominator negative 1 plus the sine of, open parenthesis, 4 x minus y, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>y</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>y</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

unit.text: 3: Differentiation: Composite, Implicit, and Inverse Functions

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
